name: Echoes In The Dark
description:
Don't look back...

Many have come to this labyrinth seeking glory, fame, and fortune. You too, seek your destiny at the end of this labyrinth, just as the many optimistic adventurers who have wandered these dark paths before you. Will you make it through these halls of bewilderment and terror, or will you become another rotting corpse on the ground as a grim caution to future heroes?

Echoes in the Dark is a top down 3D maze adventure game where you must traverse the labyrinth with a unique echolocation ability bestowed upon you by a benevolent deity. Use this strange ability, a torch, and your wits to make it through each floor, dodging dead ends and a lurking Minotaur...
